title: Boomerang = Bumerang
brief_description: Cartoon in which a butterfly causes trouble at a rocket station. This film is a satire on a military dictatorship and the perseverance of the human spirit. The soundtrack contains no music or dialogue, only sound effects. Animated by Branislav Nemet and Turido Paus.
